turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I'm craving coffee, can you do a Starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks store do you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Southeast Hawthorne in Portland, OR.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you ready for my order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande mocha with two pumps vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk? They have almond milk and coconut milk now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and you wanted a grande right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to put it on your Starbucks card?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay the order is placed at the SE Hawthorne Starbucks and you will get a text receipt.
